commands.description: Add a new item to the current list
Complete the selected task/s
Postpone the selected task's by one day if they have a due date
Add a note to the selected task
Rename the selected item
Undo the last action
Change the due date of the selected task
Change the repeat of the selected task
Change the time estimate of the selected task
Change the tags for the selected task
Change the URL for the selected task
Change the location for the selected task
Set the priority of the selected task/s to 1
Set the priority of the selected task/s to 2
Set the priority of the selected task/s to 3
Set the selected task/s to have no priority
Select all items in the current list
Select none of the items in the current list
When on a list, move the cursor up
When on a list, move the cursor down
When on a list, select an item
Switch to the Overview screen
Switch to the Tasks screen
Switch to the Locationsscreen
Switch to the Contacts screen
Switch to the Settings screen
Switch to the next list
Switch to the previous list
Skip to Login screen (from homepage)
Switch between tabs (e.g. Task and Notes)
Toggle multi-edit mode
Save input and move to the next input field
Remove the cursor from the current input field
Moves the cursor to the search box
